channel.title: Xtreme Programming on Unladen swallow
channel.description: Recent content in Xtreme Programming on Unladen swallow

item.title: I have tried Extreme Programming within a sprint and I think it is an excellent agile method for the Ops!
item.description: Part I: Agility 2003 I have discovered the notion of extreme programming more than 15 years ago. My job was to integrate and to develop pieces of code in Java for the IBM Websphere Business Integration server. We were a small team with light programming skills. A part of our job was to operate the software, the other part was to develop. It was in 2003. We were trying hard to stick to the specific framework we developed.
